metadata.description:
![Tipping](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dapplets/tipping-dapplet/master/assets/tipping-board.png)

**Tipping** is a BOS application that can be added to Near Social posts so that authors can receive donations for them.

You can check it using our [Mutable Web gateway](https://mutable-near-soical.netlify.app/)

![mutable-near-social-001](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dapplets/tipping-dapplet/master/assets/mutable-near-social-001.png)

---

1. Follow the link above.
2. Choose Tipping mutation in the page header dropdown.
3. Look at any Near Social post. There will be Tip button near the Share button.
4. To donate to the post author click on the button. Each click adds **0.05 NEAR** to donation amount. You can click several times.

---

![mutable-near-social-002](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dapplets/tipping-dapplet/master/assets/mutable-near-social-002.png)

---

- The maximum donation amount for **one transaction** is **1 NEAR**
- The maximum donation amount for **one post** is **10 NEAR**
- There is an extra fee of **3%** on each donation
